Project Commit2Win

A Git repository tracker and challenger.

A tool to track a GitHub users repository data utilizing the official GitHub API. This group project helped develop skills working as a team and with set roles.

Skills Used: Jira, JWT Authentication, Passport, React, Redux, Router, Thunk, Mongoose, Express, Octokit, Memory-Cache
